subtitle: Tasty puff of pastry filled with a nut, cheese and fish mixture.

method.text: Roll pastry to an oblong 30x20 cm	.
Mix together the curd cheese, herbs and tomato puree. Season with pepper.

Spread onto half the pastry, leaving 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm at three edges. Cover with haddock. Layer tomatoes, walnuts and Blue Stilton on top. Dampen edges of pastry and fold over to enclose filling. Seal edges and cut steam holes in the top. Brush with beaten egg.
Bake for 25 min. Lower heat to 190°C for 15 min or until cooked and golden.
Melt butter and add flour to make a roux. Cook gently for 2 - 3 min.
Remove from heat and gradually blend in milk. Bring to boil, stirring continuously, to make a thick, smooth sauce. Add Blue Stilton and stir until melted. Season to taste.

title: Blue Stilton and haddock turnover
